details.detail: <p>Elix Technologies standardized over 50 PCs running various Windows environments, including Windows XP and Windows Vista, onto Windows 7 with Service Pack 1 and Office 2010. We assisted with the purchase of a Microsoft Volume Licensing contract and upgraded Adobe software on selected PCs. In addition, we replaced three servers with virtual machines running on a single server for enhanced flexibility and resource optimization (CPU time, memory, and disk space). The virtual machines run services such as Active Directory, Microsoft Exchange Server 2010, and CIFS file services.</p>
